PATIENT_ID: TEST_TBI_004
ARRIVAL_TIME: 2026-01-20 22:00:00

[TRAUMA_HP] 2026-01-20 22:15:00
Patient arrived via EMS following assault.
Suspected traumatic brain injury based on mechanism and altered mental status.
Patient combative, difficult to assess.
Unable to obtain accurate GCS on arrival due to patient agitation.

[PHYSICIAN_NOTE] 2026-01-20 22:45:00
Patient sedated for CT scan.
Post-sedation, unable to accurately assess neurologic status.
Awaiting CT results.

[IMAGING] 2026-01-20 23:15:00
CT BRAIN WITHOUT CONTRAST

FINDINGS:
Small right parietal contusion. No significant mass effect.

IMPRESSION:
Traumatic brain injury with small parietal contusion.

[PHYSICIAN_NOTE] 2026-01-20 23:45:00
CT confirms TBI.
Patient remains sedated, GCS assessment deferred until sedation wears off.
Admit to ICU for monitoring.
